summary: A couple of perverted and maniac killers get loose on a Greek island.
cast: Robert Behling|Jane Lyle|Jessica Dublin|Gerard Gonalons|Jannice McConnell|Nikos Tsachiridis|Jeremy Rousseau|Mike Murtagh|Clay Half|Fefi Bali|Ray Richardson|Elizabeth Spader|Marios Tartas|John Blackman|Nico Mastorakis|Takashi Yanhiro|Hiroshi Yuzama
title: Island of Death
